WRITING.TEXT:
My friend, it's really nice that you found a girl :) Have you tried to contact her again and explain why you drank beforehand? If she was interested, she would listen
You seem like a cool, smart guy, the kind of guy people like to befriend. Scars heal quickly with Bio-oil. Death is never the way out my friend. Please live on, I promise you it will get better. Life is a rollercoaster of highs and lows, and if you've been experiencing a lot of lows, I can guarantee that you that the highs will come soon.
I wish you all the best in life :) btw, if you're interested in music, you should listen to City Colour. It's sad music, but it's beautiful and meaningful and I think you can identify with him :) Good luck and best wishes 3

My friend, I see you're sad, but I would certainly not say you're a loser. I know people who see themselves as great people who are much less reflected than you. You seem to understand a lot more than most, and that I must respect, but it seems dumb losing someone like you. We need people like you :)
Hi :) What is bothering you my friend? If you ever come to Northern Norway you're welcome to visit me

Hi friend, you don't need to tell anyone :) either way, it is nothing wrong with owning a dog for that reason either. It's okay to be depressed and lonely, I'm just really glad you found help. Cheers from Norway :D
Thats why Israel came to be. So non-jews could earn money
